The Invocation was delivered by Rev. Ronald L. Bailey, Love Gospel Assembly, 2315 Grand Concourse, The Bronx, New York 10468.

Council Member Baez moved  that the Invocation be spread in full upon the Minutes and adopted.

Items.Title: Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges, and Elections

Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections approving the re-appointment by the Mayor of ERIC ARTHUR GOLDSTEIN as a member of the New York City Environmental Control Board.

The Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections, which was referred to on May 28, 2003, respectfully

REPORTS

Pursuant to sections 31 and 1404 of the New York City Charter, the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections, hereby approves the re-appointment by the Mayor of ERIC ARTHUR GOLDSTEIN as a member of the New York City Environmental Control Board (member with experience in air pollution control) to serve for the remainder of a four-year term that commenced on March 6, 2001 and will expire on March 5, 2005.

Res. No. _____

RESOLUTION APPROVING THE RE-APPOINTMENT BY THE MAYOR  OF  ERIC ARTHUR GOLDSTEIN AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY ENVIRONMENTAL CONTROL BOARD.

By Council Member Comrie

RESOLVED, that pursuant to sections 31 and 1404 of the New York City Charter, the Council does hereby approve the re-appointment by the Mayor of ERIC ARTHUR GOLDSTEIN as a member of the New York City Environmental Control Board (member with experience in air pollution control) for the remainder of a four-year term that commenced on March 6, 2001 and will expire on March 5, 2005.
Items.MatterName: M 607 - Eric A. Goldstein, Environmental Control Board

Items.Title:
Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections approving the designation of YOUNGIK YOON as a member of the New York City Civilian Complaint Review Board.

The Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections, which was referred to on June 25, 2003, respectfully

REPORTS

Pursuant to section 440 of the New York City Charter, the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections, hereby approves the designation by the Council of YOUNGIK YOON, as a member of the New York City Civilian Complaint Review Board to serve for a the remainder of a three-year term expiring on July 4, 2004.

Res. No. 969

RESOLUTION APPROVING THE DESIGNATION BY THE COUNCIL OF YOUNGIK YOON AS A MEMBER OF THE  NEW YORK CITY CIVILIAN COMPLAINT REVIEW BOARD.

By Council Member Comrie

RESOLVED, that pursuant to section 440 of the New York City Charter, the Council does hereby approve the designation of YOUNGIK YOON, as a member of the New York City Civilian Complaint Review Board for the remainder of a three-year term expiring on July 4, 2004.
Items.MatterName: M 666 - Youngik Yoon, Esq., New York City Civilian Complaint Review Board

Items.Title:
Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections approving the appointment of VERONICA VILLANUEVA as a member of the New York City Equal Employment Practices Commission.

The Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections, which was referred to on June 25, 2003, respectfully

REPORTS

Pursuant to section 830 of the New York City Charter, the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections, hereby approves the appointment by the Council of VERONICA VILLANUEVA, as a member of the New York City Equal Employment Practices Commission to serve for a the remainder of a four-year term expiring on June 30, 2004.

Res. No. 970

RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT BY THE COUNCIL OF VERONICA VILLANUEVA AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY  EQUAL EMPLOYMENT PRACTICES COMMISSION.

By Council Member Comrie

RESOLVED, that pursuant to section 830 of the New York City Charter, the Council does hereby approve the appointment of VERONICA VILLANUEVA, as a member of the New York City Equal Employment Practices Commission for the remainder of a four-year term expiring on June 30, 2004.
Items.MatterName: M 667 - Veronica Villanueva, Esq., New York City Equal Employment Practices Commission.
